CustomField.formula: IF( Is_current_month__c, if(OR(ISBLANK(Work_Days_Excl_Holiday_Till_Today__c), Work_Days_Excl_Holiday_Till_Today__c = 0), Allocated_Quantity__c, (Allocated_Quantity__c/Work_Days_Excl_Holiday_Till_Today__c) * Work_Days_Excl_Holiday_This_Month__c ), IF(MONTH(Posting_Period__c) < MONTH(TODAY()), Allocated_Quantity__c, Contracted_Quantity__c))
CustomField.label: Forecasted Quantity
